title: Multiclassing
content: Defense Features learned across multiple Classes also do not stack. This means that the benefits brought about by the Feature does not multiply regardless of how many times it is learned. Spellcaster Level: Characters Multiclassing in multiple spellcaster Classes have an extra hidden stat called their Spellcaster Level, which will determine the number of Spell Slots they will have at their disposal.
